text: David B. Cornstein (born August 17, 1938) is an American businessman and politician. He is the United States Ambassador to Hungary. He is from New York and his business career is about gambling operations, high-end used jewelry and telemarketing. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: David Cornstein
